metadata.title: CVE-2023-4045 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Offscreen Canvas did not properly track cross-origin tainting, which couldhave been used to access image data from another site in violation ofsame-origin policy. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 116, Firefox ESR <102.14, and Firefox ESR < 115.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
